examples.example: 生活中总会遇到一些小困难，但我们要保持乐观的态度去面对。

translate.english: There will always be some small difficulties in life, but we should maintain an optimistic attitude to face them.

examples.example: 每一天我都会做一些有意义的事情，让生活更加丰富多彩。

translate.english: Every day I will do some meaningful things to make life more colorful.

examples.example: 我送给朋友们一些精美的礼物，他们都很开心。

translate.english: I gave some exquisite gifts to my friends, and they were all very happy.
